summary: This is an email exchange between two individuals at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) regarding draft remarks for a press conference announcing the indictment of Ghislaine Maxwell. One person shares a draft document titled 'Ghislaine Maxwell Indictment Press Conference Remarks.docx' and the other acknowledges receipt and states they will review it.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the indictment for which press conference remarks are being drafted.

events.title: Drafting of Maxwell Indictment Press Remarks
events.description: Prosecutors at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York exchange drafts of remarks for an upcoming press conference to announce the indictment of Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email between prosecutors at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
The email concerns the preparation of a press conference to announce the indictment of Ghislaine Maxwell.
The correspondence shows coordination within the prosecution team on public messaging regarding a major case development.
The email is dated June 26, 2020, shortly before Maxwell's arrest on July 2, 2020.
